Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Control lighting, monitor security cameras, adjust thermostat settings, and more, all with the power of your voice. The convenience of a connected home is just a "Hey Alexa" away. Connect Alexa to BIOTA Smart Home in a few simple steps:
1. Download the "BIOTA Smart Home" app from the Apple App Store or Google Play Store and register for an account.
2. Configure your devices in the "BIOTA Smart Home" app and assign an appropriate name for your devices.
3. Download the Alexa app from the Apple App Store or Google Play Store and then configure your Echo device with the Alexa app.
4. Search for the "BIOTA Smart Home" skill from the Alexa app skills category.
5. Enable the skill, and you will be navigated to the login page. Follow the instructions on the page to complete the link.
6. That’s it! You can now enjoy the convenience of voice control on your home devices like this:
“Alexa, turn on the bedroom light.”
“Alexa, turn off the bedroom light.”
“Alexa, set the bedroom light to 50%.”
“Alexa, brighten the bedroom light to 50%.”
“Alexa, dim the bedroom light to 50%.”
"Alexa, set bedroom light to green."
